original_text: For dogs have compassed me: the assembly of the wicked have inclosed me: they pierced my hands and my feet.
korean_text: 개들이 나를 에워쌌으며 악한 무리가 나를 둘러 내 수족을 찔렀나이다

sentences.original_text: the assembly of the wicked have inclosed me
they pierced my hands and my feet
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 내 손과 내 발을 찔렀도다
